Package dao

Class ChoixDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO
dao.ChoixDAO
public class ChoixDAO
extends AbstractDAO
This is a DAO class that interacts with the data base concerning the choices treatments
Author:
mounsit kaddami yan perez

    Allows to store in the data base an access condition over a given choice
    int addChoice​(java.lang.String story, int idParagraph, java.lang.String text)

    boolean isMasked​(int idChoice)
    see if the choice must not be displayed in reading mode it is about verifying if the choice leads to a conclusion or not
    void listParConditionRecur​(int stopIn, java.lang.String stopSt, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> insertIn, int prevPar, java.lang.String prevStory, java.sql.Connection conn)

    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> listParForCondition​(int idChoice)
    allows to retrieve the list of the paragraphs that the user can choose between them to define his access condition
    java.lang.Integer lockChoice​(int idChoice, java.lang.String lockedBy)
    lock the choice in the data base and return the associated paragraph id to update after with the appropriate text Or null if the user has no right to lock

    this method allows to retrieve the data stored about the paragraph associated to a certain choice identified by the given parameter
    void unlockChoice​(int idChoice)
    this method allows to unlock the choice if the writer does not want no longer write the choice's paragraph, it also do some cleaning by deleting the paragraph written by the user before that.

    • ChoixDAO

      public ChoixDAO​(javax.sql.DataSource dataSource)

  • Method Details

    • getChoice

      public Choix getChoice​(int idChoice)
      this method allows to get all the information stored in the data base about a choice identified by an the integer given in parameters
      Parameters:
      idChoice - : an integer that identifies the choice in the data base
      Returns:
      Choix : an object that groups the informations found about the choice

    • addChoice

      public int addChoice​(java.lang.String story, int idParagraph, java.lang.String text)
      This allows to add to the data base a choice that follows a certain paragraph the id returned must be stored in the corresponding paragraph list of choices
      Parameters:
      story - : the story to which the paragraph and the choice belongs
      idParagraph - : the id of the paragraph that precedes the choice
      text - : the choice states
      Returns:
      the id of the choice inserted in the data base

    • addChoice

      public int addChoice​(java.lang.String story, int idParagraph, java.lang.String text, java.lang.String assocStory, int assocPar)
      This allows to add to the data base a choice that follows a certain paragraph
      Parameters:
      story - : the story to which the paragraph and the choice belongs
      idParagraph - : the id of the paragraph that precedes the choice
      text - : the choice states
      assocStory - : the story to which the paragraph that the choice leads to belongs
      assocPar - : the paragraph to which the choice must lead
      Returns:
      the id of the choice inserted in the data base

    • isMasked

      public boolean isMasked​(int idChoice)
      see if the choice must not be displayed in reading mode it is about verifying if the choice leads to a conclusion or not
      Parameters:
      idChoice -
      Returns:

    • retreiveCorrPar

      public Paragraphe retreiveCorrPar​(int idChoice)
      this method allows to retrieve the data stored about the paragraph associated to a certain choice identified by the given parameter
      Parameters:
      idChoice - : the id of the choice
      Returns:
      an object paragraphe that groups the data about the associated paragraph

    • lockChoice

      public java.lang.Integer lockChoice​(int idChoice, java.lang.String lockedBy)
      lock the choice in the data base and return the associated paragraph id to update after with the appropriate text Or null if the user has no right to lock
      Parameters:
      idChoice -
      lockedBy - : the userName of the user who asked to lock the choice
      Returns:

    • unlockChoice

      public void unlockChoice​(int idChoice)
      this method allows to unlock the choice if the writer does not want no longer write the choice's paragraph, it also do some cleaning by deleting the paragraph written by the user before that.
      Parameters:
      idChoice - : the id of the choice to unlock

    • getAccessCondition

      public java.lang.Integer getAccessCondition​(int idChoice)
      This allows to verify if there is an access condition over the choice identified by the given parameter
      Parameters:
      idChoice - : the id of the choice
      Returns:
      the id of the paragraph that represents the access condition or null if there is no access condition

    • lockedOrDoneBy

      public java.lang.String lockedOrDoneBy​(int idChoice)
      Parameters:
      idChoice -
      Returns:
      the userName of the user who locked the choice or wrote it

    • associateParagraph

      this method allows to define the paragraph to which the choice must lead
      Parameters:
      idChoice -
      idParagraph -
      story -

    • listParConditionRecur

      public void listParConditionRecur​(int stopIn, java.lang.String stopSt, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> insertIn, int prevPar, java.lang.String prevStory, java.sql.Connection conn)
      This method allows to retrieve recursively the list of the paragraphs that the user can choose as an access condition over the choice he is writing
      Parameters:
      stopIn - : allows to define the stop condition of the recursion
      stopSt - : allows to define the stop condition of the recursion
      insertIn - : the list of the paragraphs to fill
      prevPar -
      prevStory -
      conn - : Data Base connection

    • listParForCondition

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> listParForCondition​(int idChoice)
      allows to retrieve the list of the paragraphs that the user can choose between them to define his access condition
      Parameters:
      idChoice -
      Returns:
      a list of paragraphs that the user can choose one of them to define his access condition

    • getChoiceLockedBy

      public java.lang.Integer getChoiceLockedBy​(java.lang.String user)
      allows to retrieve the id of the choice which is locked by the user identified by the given parameter it is unique by definition
      Parameters:
      user -
      Returns:
      the id of the locked choice if it exists or null if there is no choice locked by the given user

    • addAccessCondition

      public void addAccessCondition​(int idChoice, int idParagraph, java.lang.String story)
      Allows to store in the data base an access condition over a given choice
      Parameters:
      idChoice - : the id of the choice over which must establish an access condition
      idParagraph - : it defines the condition
      story - : it defines the condition
